work_status: Unemployed, laid off, looking for work
agent_profile_summary: Ryan Henderson, a 31-year-old from Philadelphia, was raised in a traditional Orthodox-Christian household by a teacher father and a nurse mother, both of whom instilled in him values of responsibility and compassion. After earning a Bachelorâ€™s in Political Science, he moved to Chicago on a leap of faith to support his partner, a decision that reshaped his career path and led him back to Philadelphia after a layoff. Now married with a six-year-old daughter, Emily, he balances part-time jobs at a community center and data entry with being a present father and caregiver. He volunteers at a local food pantry and continues to write, reflecting on his experiences and the evolving priorities in his life. Navigating the tension between his earlier ambitions and the realities of family and financial stability, Ryan finds meaning in small, consistent acts of care and connection, shaping how he relates to others with a blend of resilience and humility.
